# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(paraDIS_tecplot)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
paraDIS_tecplotPluginInfo.C
paraDIS_tecplotCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
paraDIS_tecplotPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
paraDIS_tecplotMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtparaDIS_tecplotFileFormat.C
RC_c_lib/args.c
RC_c_lib/debugutil.c
RC_c_lib/signals.c
RC_c_lib/fileutils.c
RC_c_lib/inventor.c
RC_cpp_lib/RangeList.C
RC_cpp_lib/timer.C
RC_cpp_lib/pathutil.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
paraDIS_tecplotEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtparaDIS_tecplotFileFormat.C
RC_c_lib/args.c
RC_c_lib/debugutil.c
RC_c_lib/signals.c
RC_c_lib/fileutils.c
RC_c_lib/inventor.c
RC_cpp_lib/RangeList.C
RC_cpp_lib/timer.C
RC_cpp_lib/pathutil.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
)

ADD_DEFINITIONS("-DNO_BOOST")
ADD_DEFINITIONS("-IRC_c_lib")
ADD_DEFINITIONS("-IRC_cpp_lib")

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IparaDIS_tecplotDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IparaDIS_tecplotDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IparaDIS_tecplotDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MparaDIS_tecplotDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES}    )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MparaDIS_tecplotDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MparaDIS_tecplotDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MparaDIS_tecplotDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EparaDIS_tecplotDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EparaDIS_tecplotDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EparaDIS_tecplotDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EparaDIS_tecplotDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EparaDIS_tecplotDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EparaDIS_tecplotDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EparaDIS_tecplotDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EparaDIS_tecplotDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_PREFIX(${INSTALLTARGETS})
